channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CO
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CO

item.title: Report E-2024010474
item.description:
Report E-2024010474

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-30T15:10:41+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-24
  • City: AURORA
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS SHARED SERVICES, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On January 24, 2024, one (1) 55-gallon drum containing UN2922 was punctured by a forklift and released approximately less than one (<1) gallon of product to the dock floor. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Environmental Hazmat Services, Inc. (EHS) to remediate the impacted site. EHS personnel deployed granular absorbents to the impacted dock and swept them in with hand tools. All spent absorbents were collected and containerized into one (1) 5-gallon bucket. EHS personnel placed the damaged 55-gallon drum of product into one (1) 95-gallon drum for disposal.

item.title: Report X-2024010679
item.description:
Report X-2024010679

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-29T15:11:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-15
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg, was in hazmat cage when I arrived and when I did an inspected this was unprocessed and the bottom of the tote was full I used a glove to search for bottles but only plastic, so not sure if due to freezing temperatures this cracked inner bag or a sharp object made this damaged. DescribePack: Inner bag was floating in tote so not sure if inner bag was punctured or it froze on what caused this to damage. DurationRel: 34 and MitigateEffect: Pkg was placed inside a tote and was placed in hazmat cage so I could inspect it.
